message.body: I once knew a man named Mark.
Who Is this?
I'm not even a contact anymore?
Got an I phone
Old one is dead
My house, you ?
Welcome to the club. Where are you?
Proctoring. I wish you could bring me coffee.
Like administering a test?
That's correct.
I give up.
Don't do that, you have so much to offer the world.
I have a theory.
lean and blond
How have you been?
That could be so many people
I'm well. Elbow deep in the acheulian era at the moment. Yourself?
You are stone axe deep in it. I'm in my bed and there is a sleeping girl here beside me. the sun has no entrance in my room, so though I have been awake for 2 hours, I still think that it is night.
Do you know this girl? It is certainly not night, we left that behind hours ago. But I like the way you see things.
You work for Kaplan? Princeton review?
Self governed schools demand tribute. Just the goodness of my heart. When I work, I work in the collections room, cataloguing old bits
Diamond turtle's eyes and honey bun fossils?
Fresco fragments from Pompeii, most recently
I want to sculpt one those people who appear to have tripped as they were running from the lava. They looked back, arms up, but it was too late.
Of
Coming to lancaster for chiasmus?
They are stunning. Are you still there? I will be visiting for at least one day. Bringing the boyfriend to the hometown.
Boyfriends. Girlfriends. Passion. Entropy. My situation is totally entropic right now.
But you have a warm body next to you, isn't that what counts? A consistent lover is not insignificant. Boyfriends are just another routine.
